name: Screeps
description: Screeps is an open source MMO RTS sandbox game for programming enthusiasts, wherein the core mechanic is programming your units AI. You control your colony by writing JavaScript which operates 24/7 in the single persistent world filled by other players on par with you.
minimum_requirements: Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
